column4: I get a black screen when gdm starts. I have an intel 915gm graphics chip. A howto at http://www.bram.be/travelmate_4651lci.html tells me to install a new i810 driver. I did so and I still get a black screen
do this in the terminal  sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
I went through the dpkg-reconfigure screens and selected the defaults for everything. that didn't help, heh. what specifically should I do differently in there?
